TopicTitle: Internet box with thousand tv channels

Articles.Content:
just curious who ever tried to zap over a few thousand tv channel from various country with it's internet box
(when it's possible for free with the monthly bill, you can often access the mains tv channel from a country)

i found that pretty fun socio-psycho-geo-politico-edu-local-worldwide related
